definitions.definition: To defame (someone), especially in a manner that meets the legal definition of libel .
examples: He libelled her when he published that.

definitions.definition: To proceed against ( goods , a ship , etc.) by filing a legal claim .

main_definition: To defame (someone), especially in a manner that meets the legal definition of libel .
secondary_definitions: To proceed against ( goods , a ship , etc.) by filing a legal claim .
